thread.title: MusicNews | Hozier, Gavin James, Little Green Cars & more to play huge charity gig at 3Arena in December
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Hozier, Gavin James, Little Green Cars & more to play huge charity gig at 3Arena in December - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | Hozier, Gavin James, Little Green Cars & more to play huge charity gig at 3Arena in December
text:
A huge charity gig is to be held at the 3Arena in December, with Hozier heading up an all-star Irish line-up.
The 2FM Xmas Ball in aid of the ISPCC will take place on Wednesday, December 23rd , headlined by the globetrotting Wicklow man.
He'll be joined by Gavin James, Little Green Cars, The Riptide Movement, Ryan Sheridan, Hudson Taylor and more to be announced.
Tickets are â‚¬45 and on sale this Friday from usual outlets at 9am.
MORE: Watch: Gavin James's new video, made by the folks behind Hozier's 'Take Me to Church'
MORE: Watch: Hozier shares behind-the-scenes tour footage in video for new single 'Jackie & Wilson'
MORE: Foals announce date at Dublin's 3Arena in February
